A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Saw it on Blu Ray\, and found myself bored to death. The new characters don't seem to belong and I cared little about the scenes given to them. Had moments watching it thinking \"when is this horror show going to end\"\n\nI came into this movie hopeful that Luke Skywalker would have a great role in this film. Turns out he's a pathetic and cowardly old man\, honestly this did not even feel like a Star Wars movie.
